archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0086
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to see the status of my returned/repaired device and manage it if necessary, so that I don't have to call Vodafone for this

properties.value: can this be a case registration? The statuses could be pushed from external system (if available) V.CASE system will be available Jan-Mar 2021. Both for consumer and business. Question how to integrate with this system.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
